title: Brad Stone, "Amazon Unbound: Jeff Bezos and the Invention of a Global Empire"
description:
Bloomberg News' Brad Stone reports on the growth and evolution of Amazon and profiles its founder Jeff Bezos. He's interviewed by Insider's chief tech correspondent Eugene Kim.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
